TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content: how big should i make this sucker?

how big should i make this sucker?

I\'m not good with dimensions, so 2 stock tanks across, 3 tanks back, and one heigh.
3m base, 1m nose.
Judging by the shape I think three meters at the aft and one at the fore would do it as well.

nah. it is a single stage reusable craft. It has to be much bigger than that

Not sure I feel like it after learning no one really likes or uses my stuff anyway.
I\'ve built stuff around your rockets plenty of times and think they work nicely.
ah this makes me feel better. have pictures?

This one is after the two radial stages had been jettisoned. I had to use the parts from Novapunch because your radial decoupler was a little screwy at this point. I should update my parts pack with your latest one.
awesome. yeah at some point I need to make the radial Decoupler all straf attach. what was the problem it was having?
It was still set up to attache at the original diameter tanks, not the new half sized.

huh? Odd. It should work right. since I released it with it working fine. have you gotten v0.4?

what engine should i use? make the liniar spike engines or just conventional engine?

what engine should i use? make the liniar spike engines or just conventional engine?

The linear spike engine would be great. She didn\'t have the oppurtunity to fly in real life, she deserves to be complete in the game

On the matter of the size, I have to agree with the others. 1m at the top, and 3 or 3,5m at the base. It\'s true, that it shouldn\'t be too small, but overkilling it would be as bad.

And don\'t worry about what the others think. Personaly I\'m not a big fan of the Failcan rocket series either (it works well, it\'s just too big for me), but the Durgun is simply awsome, and this one looks pretty neat as well.

And a question: How will the landing work? Will she have an almost indestructible fuselage like Nova\'s Vanguard or something different?
1m round at the front, 1,5m tall and 4m wide at the back.

Mr. Box,

Your stuff rocks, and I anxiously await the release of the SSTO vehicle. <3

thanks

what is ssto?
Single Stage to Orbit.
just the beginning need to evolve it a bit.

just the beginning need to evolve it a bit.

thats awesome!
you ain\'t seen nothing yet.

Something righteously kick-ass is in store for us then?

Wonder what it\'ll be. 8)
RCS effect by altering throttle on differnet engines??? I know its not possiable just yet but hey i can dream. OR its this going to be gimbled in an interesting way?

I seriously can\'t wait for this.

How is the lift value for this lifting body craft going to work?

I seriously can\'t wait for this.

How is the lift value for this lifting body craft going to work?

I have no idea. I never made fins or played with C7s stuff It will be a learning experience.

as for the engine. i ahvbe decided to make it able to fit normal kerbal parts since It will be a lovely engine and I like seeing my stuff used on other contraptions.
I like it Finally:D

That is quite impressive.

Very. Impressive, really.
